network.title: Connection Lost
network.description: We couldn't reach our servers. Please check your internet connection and try again.

server.title: Server Error
server.description: Something went wrong on our end. Our team has been notified and is working on it.

general.title: Unable to load content
general.description: We're having trouble loading this content. Please try again in a moment.

global.title: System Error
global.description: A critical error occurred and the application cannot be rendered. Please try reloading the page.
